Introduction

BADVILLAIN is a seven-member girl group under BPM Entertainment.

The group, initially announced as a six-member ensemble, caught the public’s attention with a teaser video released by BPM Entertainment on April 4, 2024. The anticipation for their debut, scheduled for the first half of 2024, heightened with a spoiler film on BPM’s official YouTube channel, which intriguingly disclosed the addition of a seventh member to the lineup.

On June 3, 2024, BADVILLAIN debuted with their first single album "OVERSTEP". On June 26th, 2024, BADVILLAIN received the award of "Next Leader" at the K-DREAM Awards.
